question: Which of the following succeeded Ram Mohan Roy as the head of the Brahma Samaj?
explanation: Debendra Nath Tagore was the son of Dwarkanath Tagore. He along with Raja Ram Mohan Roy founded the Brahmo Samaj. After the death of Raja Ram Mohan Roy, Debendra Nath Tagore succeeded him as the leader of the Brahmo Samaj.
